definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Plant fiber is still the mainstream material which is used in cone speakers.
sentences.chinese: 植物纖維材料仍是揚聲器紙盆用料的主流。

sentences.english: As a new method of drying, microwave was used for radio cone paper drying.
sentences.chinese: 微波乾燥揚聲器紙盆是一項新的技術。
